:Najah:

Najah didn't wait an invitation and showing his rockerts  (That ap=
peared in his back) and flew towards the fight.
  ----- Original Message --=
--- 
  From: Yanshosh@... 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Monday, Oc=
tober 16, 2000 8:03 AM
  Subject: Re: There Is No Escape


  These arguemen=
ts are starting to tick me off. Yes, I did ask KSL to be a 
  moderator, be=
cause he has much more RPGing experience than me, and I am 
  running very =
low on time, and cutting alot of events I shouldn't to be able 
  to RP. TH=
at doesn't mean he's in charge of the RPG, or has any special 
  powers. Ev=
eryone can point out where rules are broken (but it might get 
  annoying),=
 but KSL is stricter than me, so I figured he'd make a good 
  moderator. I=
 admit that small rules don't need to be pointed out (swearing in 
  OOC ma=
ils, etc.) but moding and the like does.

  And SoulStice, I'd like you to =
show me the post where Unitron broke the shot 
  limit. I could at least be=
 sure that KSL is human then... (kidding)

  But everyone leave KSL alone, =
he's only doing his job. And start arguing.

  ::Zardus/Reptilica/Bloodystr=
ike/DevilDuer/WarMachine::

  Zardus watches the Chosen Mafia scramble to r=
etreat, frowning. Looking down 
  at his wrist comp, Zardus taps a few butt=
ons, the Alliance base tracking 
  Deemos' group's location and keeping a w=
atch on them.

  "Should we follow?" War Machine's voice booms as he steps =
closer to Zardus, 
  looking at the combining Mafia in the distance.

  "Ye=
s," Zardus says, "Kill them."

  WarMachine nods, running at the Mafia gest=
alt, firing missiles and plasma 
  charges.

  "Dark One," Zardus says into=
 his comm, "Can you and your group combine and 
  take that enemy gestalt o=
ut?"

  "Everyone else," he says after switching his comm to the whole Alli=
ance, "If 
  you're not too damage, pursue and destroy. If you are damaged,=
 get into the 
  CR chambers."

  With that, he activates his jetpack, flyi=
ng after the Mafia and firing at 
  Deemos.
  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
  Bloody=
strike recieves Zardus' orders, flying past the running WarMachine and 
  f=
iring a missile at Sharpedge.
  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
  Reptilica steps out =
of the CR chamber, grumbling about dangerous work when he 
  recieves Zardu=
s' transmission. He walks to a door, taking off at the exit of 
  the base =
at a run.
  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
  DevilDuer comes to a stop as he sees the=
 Chosen Mafia retreating a few dozen 
  feet away from him.

  "That's them=
!" he yells as he sees the Alliance shots heading for them, "We 
  need ta =
kill 'em!"

  He pulls out his stun gun again, running after Stronghold and=
 firing.

        eGroups Sponsor
